name: SEBI LODR Regulation 17 - Board Composition
description: Composition of the Board of Directors with optimum executive/non-executive mix
requirements: Minimum 6 directors (for top 2000), at least one woman director, and 33-50% independent directors depending on Chairperson status.
llm_instruction: Check the Board Composition table. Verify at least one woman director and that independent directors meet the 33% (non-executive chair) or 50% (executive chair) threshold.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 18 - Audit Committee
description: Constitution and functioning of the Audit Committee
requirements: Minimum 3 directors, two-thirds independent, all financially literate.
llm_instruction: Verify the Audit Committee has at least 3 members and 2/3rds are independent. Confirm if the Chairperson is an Independent Director.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 19 - Nomination and Remuneration Committee
requirements: Minimum 3 directors, all non-executive, at least 50% independent.
llm_instruction: Extract the NRC composition and ensure at least 50% are independent. Check for the presence of a performance evaluation criteria for directors.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 24 - Material Subsidiaries
description: Corporate governance requirements for subsidiary companies
requirements: At least one independent director of the holding company on the board of unlisted material subsidiaries.
llm_instruction: Confirm if the company has a 'Policy for determining Material Subsidiaries' and if an independent director is placed on the subsidiary's board.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 25 - Independent Directors Obligations
description: Familiarization programs and separate meetings for ID
requirements: Hold at least one separate meeting of IDs per year; D&O Insurance for IDs (top 1000).
llm_instruction: Verify that a separate meeting of Independent Directors was held during the year and look for mention of D&O insurance coverage.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 27 - Corporate Governance Report
description: Quarterly and annual submission of compliance report
requirements: Presence of a separate section on Corporate Governance in the Annual Report.
llm_instruction: Confirm the presence of a comprehensive Corporate Governance Report and a compliance certificate from either auditors or a practicing company secretary.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 30 - Material Events Disclosure
description: Disclosure of events based on materiality policy
requirements: Disclosure of acquisitions, schemes, or litigation impacting more than 2% of turnover/net worth.
llm_instruction: Identify any 'Material Events' disclosed during the year and verify if the company has a Board-approved Materiality Policy.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 34 - Annual Report Contents
description: Mandatory components of the Annual Report
requirements: Must include Management Discussion and Analysis (MD&A) and Business Responsibility Report.
llm_instruction: Check for the MD&A section and verify it covers industry structure, opportunities, threats, and risks.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 43A - Dividend Distribution Policy
requirements: Formulation and disclosure of a dividend distribution policy in the annual report and website.
llm_instruction: Verify if the company has disclosed the Dividend Distribution Policy and mentions specific financial parameters considered for dividend declaration.

name: SEBI LODR Regulation 46 - Website Disclosures
description: Maintenance of functional website with specific information
requirements: Mandatory disclosure of financial results, shareholding, and policies on the company website.
llm_instruction: Ensure the report mentions the website URL and confirms that all mandatory policies (RPT, Materiality, NRC) are hosted online.
